entities.name: lucius malfoy
entities.description: Lucius Malfoy is mentioned as a suspect who could have put a curse on someone. He is described as being at the Ministry and possibly trying to sneak down to find out what happened in Harry's hearing.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as having had a hearing and being suspicious of Lucius Malfoy. He also mentions that Sturgis Podmore was arrested for trying to get through a door.

entities.name: sturgis podmore
entities.description: Sturgis Podmore is mentioned as having been arrested for trying to get through a door. It is suggested that Lucius Malfoy may have put the curse on him.

entities.name: moody's invisibility cloak
entities.description: Moody's Invisibility Cloak is mentioned as being possessed by Sturgis Podmore.

entities.name: department of mysteries corridor
entities.description: The Department of Mysteries corridor is mentioned as a location where Lucius Malfoy was seen by Harry.

relationships.description: Lucius Malfoy is suspected of putting a curse on Sturgis Podmore.
